name: shortit
description: A quick ShortURL server with data via external JSON database. Includes Stats and LogEntries logging

scripts.tag: V=$(node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'); git add package.json; git commit -m $V; git tag -a $V -m $V
scripts.release: bump --no-tags --patch; npm run tag; git push origin; git push --tags

author: Jim Kalac
